name: The Black Cover - Multiplayer Tactical FPS
name_original: The Black Cover - Multiplayer Tactical FPS
description:
The Black Cover is an under development tactical first person shooter game similar to counter strike global offensive and valorant.

 it's main focus is to analyze, plan then execute your actions

Main game-mode is "Casual" the goal is to defend 2 sites on the map from attackers that plan to detonate them while you are a defender, when you are the attacker you have to detonate those sites. (currently functional with minor issues).

Side game-modes:

- Free for all (working with no issues)

- Gun game (currently need fixes)

which you race for an amount of kills against other players. Each kill will give you different gun/weapon.

- Team death-match (currently need fixes)

- Practice

which is a closed range that let you to practice your aim and gun recoils against stationary bots with your favorite weapons and guns.

it has 3 challenges (50 ,100 and 150 Eliminations)

each challenge has a timer that you have to race and compete with your friends for best time score.

The game as mentioned it is under development and if you have any bugs or improvements

please feel free to send it to me or mention it in the comments.

thanks for your time and consideration.

best regards.
